amendment.description: To require States to impose cost-sharing for any individual enrolled in a State child health plan whose income exceeds 200 percent of the poverty line.
amendment.purpose: To require States to impose cost-sharing for any individual enrolled in a State child health plan whose income exceeds 200 percent of the poverty line.

action.text: Amendment SA 43 proposed by Senator DeMint to Amendment SA 39.

vote.text: Motion to table amendment SA 43 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 37. Record Vote Number: 16.
